hero.heading: Rohingya Refugees Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh go samborko dipong
hero.paragraph: Rohingya sath aiu jonai, amrar shikkha, chirir aroggo, khuda, abashon, ar porishkar pani programor modhe sahajjo korun.

sections.title: Amar uddehso
sections.description: Rohingya genocid survivor an Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh shorbotho porbortite niye chechhe.

sections.title: Amar kaj
sections.description: Khole jala, shelter toiri, medical treatment shomortho, shikkharo kaj.

sections.title: Hisa lowa
sections.description: Persecuted Rohingya niye unnoti toiri kora, amrar uddehso support korun.

footer.newsletter: Sorbosesh update-er jonno amader newsletter-e subscribe korun
